message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text detection, which is a computer vision problem, hence cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a novel module and a training scheme to improve the accuracy of text detection, which involves machine learning techniques, hence cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. The paper also involves natural language processing techniques, as it deals with text, hence cs.CL is a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques, as it deals with detecting text in images, hence cs.IR is also a possible sub-category.
